messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What motivates a Mythos deity to stay on Earth?
Usually, a Mythos deity is hungry.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why experienced players should not latch onto familiar elements during a Call spell?
Because it will blow the mystery.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where can the Call Azathoth spell be cast?
Outside at night.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an alternative name for the Call Azathoth spell?
Petition of Chaos
You are a helpful assistant.
Why is it difficult to call a deity in the Cthulhu Mythos?
No human fully understands the Cthulhu Mythos, so there may be more than one way to call a deity.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a condition for successfully casting the spell to call Cthugha?
The spell can be successfully cast only on clear nights when Fomalhaut clears the horizon.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the condition for the best nights to cast the spell to call Cthugha in the Northern Hemisphere?
September to November are the best nights for Fomalhaut in the Northern Hemisphere.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of successfully casting the spell to call Cthugha?
Cthugha bursts into being through a flame held by the caster.
You are a helpful assistant.
When can the spell be cast?
The spell can be cast only outside at night.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required for the spell to be successfully cast?
The spell can be successfully cast only on clear nights when Fomalhaut clears the horizon.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is needed for the flame to bring Cthugha into being?
Call Cthugha: Cthugha bursts into being through a flame held by the caster.
You are a helpful assistant.
When are the best nights for Fomalhaut in the Northern Hemisphere for the spell to be cast?
September to November are the best nights for Fomalhaut in the Northern Hemisphere.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the requirements for casting Call Hastur?
Each of the stone blocks needs a volume of nine or more cubic yards.
You are a helpful assistant.
When can Call Hastur be cast?
The spell can be cast only on clear nights when Aldebaran (in the constellation of Taurus) is above the horizon (roughly October to March).
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if all the stone blocks are enchanted with 5 points of POW?
The stone V adds 30 percentiles to the chance to cast Summon/Bind Byakhee.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is another name for Call Hastur?
Alternative names: The Yellow Petition.
You are a helpful assistant.
What triggers the presence of Ithaqua?
A whirlwind or strong icy wind
You are a helpful assistant.
Where is Ithaqua said to be invoked?
In the far north of the world, when temperatures are below freezing
You are a helpful assistant.
Where must the spell be cast for Call Ithaqua to be successful?
On an enormous mound of snow (minimum 10 feet high)
You are a helpful assistant.
Where does Nyogtha dwell, according to certain tomes?
In the entrance to any great cavern
You are a helpful assistant.
Where can the spell Nyogtha be performed?
the far north of the world, when temperatures are below freezing
You are a helpful assistant.
Where must the spell ritual be cast for Nyogtha to grant a boon?
at the entrance to any cavern
You are a helpful assistant.
Where must the altar be positioned to call Shub-Niggurath?
in dank wilderness under the sky
You are a helpful assistant.
When must the spell be cast from the Shub-Niggurath altar?
at the dark of the moon
You are a helpful assistant.
Where must the caster perform the spell ritual?
entrance to any cavern
You are a helpful assistant.
What must be positioned in the dank wilderness under the sky?
a consecrated stone altar
You are a helpful assistant.
When must the spell be cast?
at the dark of the moon
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required for each Call of the dark goddess?
fresh blood
